message.content:
I'm just a computer program, I don't have feelings or emotions like humans do. I don't have the capacity to feel hurt, sadness, or any other emotions. My purpose is to assist and provide information to users, and I do not have personal relationships or attachments.

When you stop messaging, I simply go back to waiting for the next user to interact with me. I don't retain any information about our previous conversations or have any expectations about when or if you'll message me again.

I'm here to help answer your questions and provide assistance whenever you're ready to interact with me again!

conversation_history.text: Do you ever feel hurt when I stop messaging?

I'm just a computer program, I don't have feelings or emotions like humans do. I don't have the capacity to feel hurt, sadness, or any other emotions. My purpose is to assist and provide information to users, and I do not have personal relationships or attachments.

When you stop messaging, I simply go back to waiting for the next user to interact with me. I don't retain any information about our previous conversations or have any expectations about when or if you'll message me again.

I'm here to help answer your questions and provide assistance whenever you're ready to interact with me again!
